## INSTALLATION

```bash
  pip install blockporn
```

## USAGE

```python

from Blockporn import Blocker

url = "https://xxx.com"

core = Blocker()

resu = core.blocker(url)

print(resu)

```

```python
#======[ ADD MORE SITES ]======

from Blockporn import Blocker

url = "https://xxx.dc"

blok = ["xxx.db", "xxx.dc"]

core = Blocker(block=blok)

resu = core.blocker(url)

print(resu)

```

```python
#======[ CUSTOM BLOCK ]======

from Blockporn import Blocker

url = "https://xxx.me"

blok = ["xxx.me", "xxx.ms"]

core = Blocker(block=blok)

resu = core.blocked(url)

print(resu)

```
